text: Hanuman Singh is a noted former basketball player from India. He played for India in Asian Games, Commonwealth Games and at 1980 Olympics. He was awarded Arjuna Award in 1975. Born in 1950 in Nagaur district of Rajasthan state. He studied at Military School, Ajmer. He represented Indian railways in national tournaments. He is now employed with SAIL. == References == == External links == * * * Category:Indian men's basketball players Category:Olympic basketball players of India Category:Recipients of the Arjuna Award Category:Basketball players from Rajasthan Category:People from Nagaur district Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Rajasthani people Category:Basketball players at the 1980 Summer Olympics
title: Hanuman Singh
